name: OSAWARI HOCKEY えんこちゃん
name_original: OSAWARI HOCKEY えんこちゃん
description:
Hit the ball and make the girl feel goodIt's a game where you play a ball like air hockey and hit a girl to enjoy her reaction.
Hit the part where the girl feels and fill the sensitivity gauge to move to the next scene.
If you hit the ball where the girl feels uncomfortable, you will receive damage.
It is GAMEOVER when your HP reaches 0.
She is a monkey girl "えんこ（Enko）"
This time she will play with you.
